text: The canton of Gouzon is an administrative division of the Creuse department, in central France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Gouzon.Décret n° 2014-161 du 17 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de la Creuse It consists of the following communes: #Blaudeix #La Celle-sous-Gouzon #Le Chauchet #Chénérailles #Cressat #Domeyrot #Gouzon #Issoudun-Létrieix #Jarnages #Ladapeyre #Lavaveix-les-Mines #Parsac-Rimondeix #Peyrat-la-Nonière #Pierrefitte #Pionnat #Puy-Malsignat #Saint-Chabrais #Saint-Dizier-la-Tour #Saint-Julien-le-Châtel #Saint-Loup #Saint-Médard-la-Rochette #Saint-Pardoux- les-Cards #Saint-Silvain-sous-Toulx #Trois-Fonds #Vigeville ==References== Category:Cantons of Creuse
title: Canton of Gouzon
